verbose_text: NF-kappaB activation can block apoptosis by regulating the anti-apoptosis proteins, such as inhibitor of apoptotic proteins (IAPs), or by the inhibition of prolonged c-Jun N-terminal kinase (JNK) signalling, modulating the accumulation of ROS.
evidence: NF-kappaB activation can block apoptosis by regulating the anti-apoptosis proteins, such as inhibitor of apoptotic proteins (IAPs)              , or by the inhibition of prolonged c-Jun N-terminal kinase
